items.sentence: Tom wants to make sure that doesn\'t happen to him.
Tom said he was just too tired to do anything else.
Tom said he was ready to do whatever was necessary.
I haven\'t heard from Tom since he moved to Boston.
Tom asked Mary if she was free on Valentine\'s Day.
Tom asked Mary to marry him soon after they\'d met.
Tom bought a couple of books and gave them to Mary.
Tom broke his neck falling down a flight of stairs.
Tom practices speaking French every chance he gets.
I know that plenty of guys want to go out with you.
